# claro-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description        | Type                                                                          | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Button is disabled | `boolean`                                                                     | `false`     |
| `icon`     | `icon`     | Button with icon   | `boolean`                                                                     | `false`     |
| `size`     | `size`     | Button size        | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm" \| "xl" \| "xs"`                                        | `'md'`      |
| `text`     | `text`     | Button text        | `string`                                                                      | `''`        |
| `variant`  | `variant`  | The button variant | `"disabled" \| "hover" \| "normal" \| "primary" \| "secondary" \| "tertiary"` | `'primary'` |
